document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">All </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">letters </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">write, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">fair </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Syllables </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Velvet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Sentences </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Plush </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Depths </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Ruby, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">undrained </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Hid, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Lip, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thee, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Play </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Humming </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Bird </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">sipped </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: All the letters I could write
